Text: The 1975 South African Grand Prix was a Formula One motor race held at Kyalami on 1 March 1975.

Text: 1975 South African Grand Prix:  It was race 3 of 14 in both the 1975 World Championship of Drivers and the 1975 International Cup for Formula One Manufacturers.
